title: 22-year-old Woodville man dead after gunshot to chest
content:
A Woodville man died Sunday afternoon from a gunshot wound to his chest, according to the Tyler County Sheriff's Office.
Dakota Schriefer, 22, was comparing handguns with his brother-in-law, William Dabill, outside a residence in Ivanhoe, Sheriff Bryan Weatherford said in a release.
As Dabill was handling his gun, it discharged, hitting Schriefer in the chest, witnesses told Weatherford.
Schriefer was pronounced dead at the Tyler County Hospital where he was transported by a private vehicle, Weatherford said. Tyler County authorities received the 911 call at about 3:30 p.m., when Scheifer was en route to the hospital.
An autopsy is being conducted in Beaumont, and an investigation is underway. No foul play is suspected, Weatherford said.
